text: Ovidiu Alexandru Bic (; born 23 February 1994) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for CS Universitatea Craiova. ==Club career== On 5 January 2018, Bic signed a four-and-a-half-year contract with CS Universitatea Craiova. ==Honours== Universitatea Craiova *Cupa României: 2017–18 *Supercupa României: Runner-up 2018 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Abrud Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CF Liberty Oradea players Category:FC Bihor Oradea players Category:FC Olimpia Satu Mare players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:AFC Chindia Târgoviște players
title: Ovidiu Bic
